Class ClientConfigurationService

  • java.lang.Object
    • to.sven.androidrccar.client.service.impl.ClientConfigurationService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IClientConfigurationService

    public class ClientConfigurationService
extends java.lang.Object
implements IClientConfigurationService
    Provides access to the configuration of the Client application.
    Author:
    sven
